casebody.data:
PINE
v.
WAL-MART ASSOCIATES, INC. # 1552, et al. 335A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 9, 2017 Holly M. Stott, Attorney at Law, M. Duane Jones, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Wal-Mart Associates, Inc. # 1552, et al. David A. Shelby, Attorney at Law, Salisbury, for Pine, Patricia.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th of November 2017 by Plaintiff to Stay Deadline for Filing Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of November 2017."
